description:
Light and tough, the big gaps in these pedals will shed mud and muck instantaneously. 8 replaceable pins per side create a super grippy contact surface.

  • Extruded 6061 aluminum, CNC machined body
  • Low profile design
  • Chromoly axle
  • Sealed cartridge bearings
  • Dimensions are 111 x 100 x 27mm
name: MEC Double A+ Down Hill Pedals
